attributes.action: Not re-classify Cannabis to a class B drug and to recognise that Cannabis is less harmfull than Alcahole
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Gordon Brown anounced today, 18 july 07, he will soon be anouncing plans on how the Government will be dealing with the issue of drugs in the UK, part of his plan anounced would includ Upgrading Cannabis from a Class C drug to a Class B despite the report released earlier this year showing the Harm and effects to societey of each drug, which stated that Alcahole was a much more harmfull drug. But thats ok as they make tax on that. I want the government to recognise this and to act on it, making Cannabis a less serious offence than it currently is.
